description:
A skilled sushi chef, Taku, wants to make the best sushi in Japan. His goal is to feed his blind mother. He is soon hit by a truck and loses his arms. The truck driver, Akira, forms an unlikely friendship with Taku and helps him on his journey to make the best sushi. Akira is then fatally injured by fire and ends up giving his arms to Taku.
Source: crunchyroll
